problems.title: Matrix Row Sum
problems.description: Calculate and print the sum of each row in a matrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print r lines, each containing sum of that row

problems.title: Matrix Column Sum
problems.description: Calculate and print the sum of each column in a matrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each

problems.title: Main Diagonal Sum
problems.description: Calculate the sum of main diagonal elements in a square matrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (matrix size)\nNext n lines: n space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print the sum of main diagonal

problems.title: Matrix Transpose
problems.description: Print the transpose of a matrix (rows become columns).
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print c lines with r space-separated integers (transposed matrix)

problems.title: Search Element in Matrix
problems.description: Search for an element in the matrix. Print row and column (0-indexed) if found, otherwise '-1 -1'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each\nLast line: x (element to search)

problems.title: Matrix Maximum Element
problems.description: Find the maximum element in a matrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each

problems.title: Secondary Diagonal Sum
problems.description: Calculate the sum of secondary diagonal elements in a square matrix (anti-diagonal).
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (matrix size)\nNext n lines: n space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print the sum of secondary diagonal

problems.title: Matrix Boundary Elements
problems.description: Print all boundary elements of the matrix in order (top row, right column, bottom row, left column).
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each

problems.title: Count Positive Elements
problems.description: Count how many positive elements (greater than 0) are in the matrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each

problems.title: Identity Matrix Check
problems.description: Check if a square matrix is an identity matrix (1s on main diagonal, 0s elsewhere). Print 'YES' or 'NO'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (matrix size)\nNext n lines: n space-separated integers each
